overview: This color educational movie “Narcosis” is a “scare film” about the realities of heroin and drug addiction  The title narcosis refers to a state of stupor, drowsiness, or unconsciousness produced by drugs.  According to a card at 1:50, actual addicts appear in the film.

production_companies.name: The State of California Bureau of Narcotic Enforcement

tagline: An enemy out to destroy your life
title: Narcosis
